title: OP权限  Lockette和Quickshop
author: qq1185898110
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 上白丶慧泽音
replies.txt_content:
lockette 无法破坏去配置这里修改
lockette.admin.break - 允许管理员破坏容器上的保护
lockette.admin.bypass - 允许管理员打开所有锁上的门

replies.author: 上白丶慧泽音
replies.txt_content:
#Limits the number of shops a person can create and own at a single time.
limits:
    #Disable these if you're not using them! If this is false, the rest of this section is ignored
    use: true
    #The default number of shops players can make
    default: 30
    #Players with these permissions can create these amounts of shops.
    ranks:
        #Anyone with 'quickshop.vip' permissions, can create 20 shops instead of 10.
        quickshop.vip: 60 #Players with quickshop.vip can make 20 shops.

default 在config 里面修改你想要的

replies.author: 上白丶慧泽音
replies.txt_content:
qq1185898110 发表于 2015-2-9 13:03
怎么改？？请你说具体一点
打开配置文件找到相应的文字
可以用ctrl+f来搜索
比如lockette
搜索 lockette.admin.break
lockette.admin.bypass
quickshop
搜索 default: 30

default: [上限]你要多少商店

然后后面修改 true
